name: duck with a gun
description:
sometimes if you want to repair your barn you have to take matters into your own hands

made for global game jam 2020, mostly by people who don't make games!

Thomas Mackinnon - Scripting/Art/Ending Cutscene

Oli Lerigo-Smith - Scripting/Opening Animations

Gordon Morrison - Art

Ross Halliwell - Art

Connor Longmuir - Art

Jimmy Paterson - Art

Andrew Eaves - Music & SFX
